defination: Turns off or on at a specific voltage
made_of: Electromagnet and switch or solid state type
usages: By acting as a switch it can be used to control the devices that use higher voltage
Converting low power to high power

defination: One or more relay + other components to provide isolation and protection
working: Uses Electromagnet to open or close one or many electrical contacts
usages: By acting as a switch it can be used to control the devices that use higher voltage
